formulas.name: Law of Reflection
formulas.formula: Angle of Incidence (i) = Angle of Reflection (r)

terms.i: Angle between incident ray and normal
terms.r: Angle between reflected ray and normal

formulas.description: The angle at which light hits a surface equals the angle at which it reflects.

formulas.name: Lens Formula
formulas.description: Relation between focal length, object distance, and image distance for lenses.

formulas.name: Magnification
formulas.description: Ratio of image size to object size.

formulas.name: Ohm's Law
formulas.description: Voltage across a conductor is proportional to the current through it.

formulas.name: Resistance in Series
formulas.description: Sum of resistances connected in series.

formulas.name: Resistance in Parallel
formulas.description: Reciprocal of total resistance equals sum of reciprocals of individual resistances in parallel.

formulas.name: Power
formulas.description: Power dissipated in an electrical circuit.

formulas.name: Energy
formulas.description: Energy consumed by an electrical device is the product of power and time.

formulas.name: Work Done
formulas.description: Work done when a force moves an object through a displacement.

formulas.name: Power
formulas.description: Power is the rate of doing work.

formulas.name: Kinetic Energy
formulas.description: Energy possessed by a body due to motion.

formulas.name: Potential Energy
formulas.description: Energy possessed by a body due to position.
